name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 1-Click Color Picker: Instant Eyedropper (hex, rgb, hsl)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 1-Click Color Picker extension is a useful and simple tool. Get HEX, RGB, HSL code in a click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎨 Easy and Free Color Picker Extension 🎨 Color Hex Picker For Chrome

🔥Meet 1-Click Color Picker, the perfect tool for quickly selecting and identifying colors on any webpage🔥 

Whether you're a designer, developer, or creative professional, this color picker extension makes it effortless to pick colors directly from your Chrome browser with a single click.

🔍How to find what color something is:

📌Install 1-Click Color Picker from Chrome Web Store

📌Use built-in picker to get any color from webpage in single click

📌Instantly get its color code

📌Copy or adjust a picked directly inside the extension 


💎What you will get:

✅Quick Color Picker Chrome: Pick any color from web pages or images without manually selecting it. Simply hover over the desired element and click to get the color details instantly.

✅Three color code formats, including color hex picker: Get precise color code values in various formats, including HEX, RGB, and HSV, making it versatile for any design need.

✅User-Friendly Interface: Our simple yet powerful interface is designed for ease of use and is perfect for users of all levels.

✅Free and Seamless: Add the 1-Click Color Picker from the Chrome Web Store for free. It’s easy to install and ready to use in seconds.

✅Color History: Easily revisit previous selections with a built-in “Recent colors” feature that tracks your picked colors for quick reference.

🚀🚀Install now and simplify your workflow🚀🚀

Add to Chrome and experience the best color picker Chrome has to offer!
